senses.definition: 講嘢嘅語氣態度 (tone of voice)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 一種語言喺唔同地區嘅演繹方法，可能音調、部分用字同其他變體唔同 (accent)

examples.jyutping: bak1 ging1 ge3 hong1 diu6
examples.translation: Beijing accent

senses.definition: 做某件事嘅起始 (to be the beginning or the start of something)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 身份證 X 字開頭嘅就係大陸出世。
examples.jyutping: san1 fan2 zing3 ik1 si4 zi6 hoi1 tau4 ge3 zau6 hai6 daai6 luk6 ceot1 sai3.
examples.translation: Those whose identity card number begins with an X were born in mainland China.

senses.definition: 一開始；某件事啱啱發生嗰陣（量詞：個） (the beginning; the start)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 個故事我估到個開頭，估唔到個結尾。
examples.jyutping: go3 gu3 si6 ngo5 gu2 dou2 go3 hoi1 tau4, gu3 m4 dou2 go3 git3 mei5.
examples.translation: I can predict the beginning of the story but not its ending.

senses.definition: 下半身 (lower body)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 呢個動作可以收緊下盤。
examples.jyutping: ni1 go3 dung6 zok3 ho2 ji5 sau1 gan2 haa6 pun4.
examples.translation: This workout movement can tone your lower body muscles.

senses.definition: 大氣層入面嘅各種現象喺長時間內嘅狀況，例如#降雨量、#温度、#濕度、#風向、#風速 等 (climate)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: aa3 jit6 daai3 hei3 hau6
examples.translation: sub-tropical climate

senses.definition: 普遍情況、氣氛 (situation; climate)

examples.jyutping: zing3 zi6 hei3 hau6
examples.translation: political climate

senses.definition: 形容工作要用好多勞力同心力，但係冇人會感激 (effortful but thankless; doing some hard work but not thanked for it; unappreciated)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 既然呢樣嘢吃力不討好，你做乜要做唧？你做咗人哋都唔會多謝你㗎啦。
examples.jyutping: gei3 jin4 ni1 joeng6 je5 hek3 lik6 bat1 tou2 hou2, nei5 zou6 mat1 jiu3 zou6 zek1? nei5 zou6 zo2 jan4 dei6 dou1 m4 wui5 do1 ze6 nei5 gaa3 laa1.
examples.translation: Even though you put in a lot of effort for no thanks, why are you doing it anyway? Even if you complete it, others will not show their gratitude.

senses.definition: 好#得人驚 嘅 (terrible; fearful; awful)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.jyutping: heoi1 ngai6 ge3 jan4 zeoi3 ho2 paa3
examples.translation: Hypocritical people are the most terrible.

senses.definition: 醫生幫人診症；揾醫生診症、就診 (to attend to a patient; to see the doctor)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: nei5 gei2 si4 heoi3 tai2 ji1 sang1?
examples.translation: When will you go to see the doctor?

senses.definition: 看守、維持一個地方或建築嘅安全同秩序嘅人；#管理員（量詞：個） (watchman; guard; caretaker)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: daai6 haa6 hon1 gaang1 jiu3 lau4 suk1 gaa3.
examples.translation: The caretaker of the building has to stay over night.

senses.definition: 內容 #鹹濕 嘅事物，包括話題、刊物等等 (erotica, pornography (such as topics, magazines, etc.))
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 好多小朋友喺度㗎，唔好講鹹濕嘢啦！
examples.jyutping: hou2 do1 siu2 pang4 jau5 hai2 dou6 gaa3, m4 hou2 gong2 haam4 sap1 je5 laa1!
examples.translation: As there are many children, please stop the dirty talk.

senses.definition: 即係#涼果 或 #口立濕，指味道偏濃（鹹）、有助增加口水分泌（濕）嘅醃製生果零食；常見嘅有陳皮、話梅、八仙果、檸檬乾等等 (pickled fruits (which are salty and makes one salivate, hence the name), common ones are: sun-dried mandarin peel, dried plum, dried Buddha's hand citron, and dried lemon)

examples.text: 大肚婆有時會作嘔作悶，食啲鹹濕嘢會開胃啲。
examples.jyutping: daai6 tou5 po2 jau5 si4 wui5 zok3 au2 zok3 mun6, sik6 di1 haam4 sap1 je5 wui5 hoi1 wai6 di1.
examples.translation: Pregnant women get nausea or vomiting occasionally. Pickled fruits help stimulate their appetite.

senses.definition: #血液 裏面嘅液體成分，即係去除血細胞 之後剩低嘅淺黃色透明液體；將#凝血因子 都去除埋就會變成#血清 (blood plasma)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: hyut3 zoeng1 zi3 wun6 seot6
examples.translation: plasmapheresis

senses.definition: 流出嚟嘅血 (blood that is flowing out)

examples.text: 個兇徒用棍扑到個人血漿四濺。
examples.jyutping: go3 hung1 tou4 jung6 gwan3 bok1 dou3 go3 jan4 hyut3 zoeng1 sei3 cin2.
examples.translation: The criminal beat the person until there was blood everywhere.

senses.definition: 不停噉；竭力咁做某件事；極度 (continuously; as much as possible; as extreme as possible)
senses.label: 副詞

examples.text: 佢對住個仔起勢噉鬧，差啲嚇死個老師。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 deoi3 zyu6 go3 zai2 hei2 sai3 gam2 naau6, caa1 di1 haak3 sei2 go3 lou5 si1.
examples.translation: She kept yelling at her son, which almost scared the teacher to death.

senses.definition: 敲詐；勒索 (to extort; to blackmail)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 小心三字頭嘅電話號碼，唔好俾人哼哈勒榨呀！
examples.jyutping: siu2 sam1 saam1 zi6 tau4 ge3 din6 waa2 hou6 maa5, m4 hou2 bei2 jan4 hang1 haa1 lak6  zaa3 aa3!
examples.translation: Look out for phone numbers starting with 3, don't be extorted!

senses.definition: #夏天 (summer)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: haa6 ling6 jing4
examples.translation: summer camp

senses.definition: 夏令時間，即係喺夏天將時間調整早一個鐘 (summer time)

examples.jyutping: haa6 ling6 si4 gaan3 biu2
examples.translation: summer timetable

senses.definition: 由#皮膚 毛孔分泌出嚟嘅水份，份量因體温、恐懼心情、病等因素而增加（量詞：滴） (sweat)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 勞動工人每日都會出大量汗水。
examples.jyutping: lou4 dung6 gung1 jan4 mui5 jat6 dou1 wui5 ceot1 daai6 loeng6 hon6 seoi2.
examples.translation: The blue-collars sweat a lot every day.

senses.definition: 比喻#努力 (perspiration; hard work)

examples.text: 天才係百分之1嘅靈感同百分之99嘅汗水。
examples.jyutping: tin1 coi4 hai6 baak3 fan6 zi1 jat1 ge3 ling4 gam2 tung4 baak3 fan6 zi1 gau2 sap6 gau2 ge3 hon6 seoi2.
examples.translation: Genius is one percent inspiration and ninety-nine percent perspiration.

senses.definition: 問人#係 定唔係 (Really? Is it true?)
senses.label: 語句

examples.jyutping: haa5, hai6 me1?
examples.translation: What? Really?

senses.definition: 輕鬆搞笑嘅電影、戲劇（量詞：齣／套） (comedy)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: cyu5 ging2 hei2 kek6
examples.translation: sitcom

senses.definition: 身體組織受傷之後或者發炎嘅反應，會變#紅 同埋#漲大 ((usu. of wounds or body tissue) red and swollen)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 佢唔知咩事，對眼紅腫到好似雞蛋噉。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 m4 zi1 me1 si6, deoi3 ngaan5 hung4 zung2 dou3 hou2 ci5 gai1 daan2 gam2.
examples.translation: He doesn't know what's happened; his eyes become red and swollen, just like the eggs.

senses.definition: 研究學問嘅嘢；學習嘅進度；多數指喺幼稚園、小學、中學、大學裏面嘅正規學校教育 (one's study; school work)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: fong1 fai3 hok6 jip6
examples.translation: to neglect one's studies

senses.definition: 利用水路或者空路去移動 (to navigate in water or air; to sail or to fly)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 嗰隻漁船喺航行途中遇到風暴。
examples.jyutping: go2 zek3 jyu4 syun4 hai2 hong4 hang4 tou4 zung1 jyu6 dou3 fung1 bou6
examples.translation: The fishing boat came across a storm in the course of navigation.

senses.definition: 形容一啲好舒適、好靚，但係要用好多錢先買到或者做到嘅嘢 (luxurious; sumptuous)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.jyutping: hou4 waa4 zong1 sau1
examples.translation: luxurious decoration

senses.definition: 經過商量之後，各方都同意咗會遵守嘅條文（量詞：個／份） (agreement; accord)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: mau6 jik6 hip3 ding6
examples.translation: trade agreement

senses.definition: 即係#新秀、指後來出現嘅優秀人物 (member among the younger generation who is talented and will have promising prospects; up-and-coming youngster; promising young person)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 今年奧運有好多後起之秀攞金牌。
examples.jyutping: gam1 nin2 ou3 wan6 jau5 hou2 do1 hau6 hei2 zi1 sau3 lo2 gam1 paai4.
examples.translation: Many promising young athletes won gold medals in the Olympic Games this year.

senses.definition: 公司名；歐洲嘅飛機製造商Airbus，亦都指該公司出產嘅客機（量詞：架） (Airbus)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 空中巴士A380係全球載客量最高嘅客機。
examples.jyutping: hung1 zung1 baa1 si2 ei1 saam1 baat3 ling4 hai6 cyun4 kau4 zoi3 haak3 loeng6 zeoi3 gou1 ge3 haak3 gei1.
examples.translation: The Airbus A380 is the passenger aircraft with the highest capacity in the world.

senses.definition: 同其他嘢比較嘅時候，達到相同嘅水平或者程度 (to keep up with; to emulate)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 我哋要同發達國家看齊。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 dei6 jiu3 tung4 faat3 daat6 gwok3 gaa1 hon3 cai4.
examples.translation: We need to keep up with the developed world.

senses.definition: 控制機器開始同停止運作嘅#掣（量詞：個） (switch)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: go3 din6 hei3 hoi1 gwaan1 waai6 zo2
examples.translation: The electrical switch is out of order.

senses.definition: 指人好有氣勢、有領袖風範 (vigor; energetic spirit; boldness of vision)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 我哋學校嘅校長好有氣魄。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 dei6 hok6 haau6 ge3 haau6 zoeng2 hou2 jau5 hei3 paak3
examples.translation: Our principal has an energetic spirit.

senses.definition: #天氣#温度（量詞：度） (air temperature; atmospheric temperature)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 今年入夏以嚟最高氣温係攝氏34度。
examples.jyutping: gam1 nin4 jap6 haa6 ji5 lai4 zeoi3 gou1 hei3 wan1 hai6 sip3 si6 saam1 sap6 sei3 dou6.
examples.translation: The highest temperature of this summer is 34 degree Celsius.

senses.definition: #謙卑 (modest; open-minded)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.jyutping: heoi1 sam1 hok6 zaap6
examples.translation: to be willing to learn

senses.definition: 得閒嗰陣鍾意做嘅事；#嗜好（量詞：個／種） (hobby)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: zaap6 jau4 hai6 keoi5 ge3 hing3 ceoi3.
examples.translation: His hobby is collecting stamps.

senses.definition: 對一件事想知道多啲嘅感覺 (interest (in something))

examples.jyutping: keoi5 deoi3 dei6 zat1 hok6 hou2 jau5 hing3 ceoi3.
examples.translation: He's had an interest in geology.

senses.definition: 想做一件事嘅感覺 (interest (in doing something))

examples.text: 有冇興趣一齊去旅行呀？
examples.jyutping: jau5 mou5 hing3 ceoi3 jat1 cai4 heoi3 leoi5 hang4 aa3?
examples.translation: Interested in going on a trip together?

senses.definition: 需要做過一啲嘢或者努力過先有嘅；唔係一出世就有嘅 (acquired; not innate)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.jyutping: hau6 tin1 sing3 min5 jik6 lik6
examples.translation: acquired immunity

senses.definition: #知識；一個人識嘅嘢 (knowledge)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 呢個人好有學問，識好多嘢。
examples.jyutping: ni1 go3 jan4 hou2 jau5 hok6 man6, sik1 hou2 do1 je5.
examples.translation: This guy is knowledgeable. He knows a lot.

senses.definition: 學術研究 （量詞：門） (academic research; scholar activities)

examples.jyutping: zou6 hok6 man6
examples.translation: to engage in scholar activities

senses.definition: #校服 中配襯裇衫嘅#呔（量詞：條） (school tie)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: haau6 taai1 ge3 coeng4 dou6 jiu3 sik1 zung1.
examples.translation: The length of the school tie should be appropriate.

senses.definition: 利用武器（通常係槍械）嘅輔助嚟搶劫 (armed robbery)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: haai6 gip3 on3
examples.translation: armed robbery case

senses.definition: 扯開喉嚨大叫 (to roar; to howl)
senses.label: 語素

examples.jyutping: paau4 haau1
examples.translation: to howl

senses.definition: 某啲嘢發生過而留低嘅#印記（量詞：條） (mark or trace)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: zip3 han2
examples.translation: fold marks

senses.definition: 令一樣嘢唔再閂埋，或者令兩樣嘢唔再貼埋一齊，從而令空間形成 (to open (something that was shut); to open up (creating space or a gap))
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: hoi1 coeng1
examples.translation: to open a window

senses.definition: 容許進入某個場所 (to allow access into a place)

examples.text: 間舖開通宵㗎，有得喺處打躉。
examples.jyutping: gaan1 pou3 hoi1 tung1 siu1 gaa3, jau5 dak1 hai2 syu3 daa2 dan2.
examples.translation: The shop opens overnight. One can hang around there.

senses.definition: 形容花綻放 (to bloom)

examples.jyutping: faa1 jyun2 di1 faa1 hoi1 saai3 laa3 wo3.
examples.translation: The flowers in the garden have all bloomed.

senses.definition: 開始做某種行為、動作，即係原本唔係做緊，之後做呢個轉換過程 (to start doing something; to commence)

examples.jyutping: hoi1 gung1
examples.translation: to start work

senses.definition: 解除限制 (to unlock; to lift (a ban or restriction))

examples.jyutping: hoi1 so2
examples.translation: to unlock (a door)

senses.definition: #舉行 (to hold (an event))

examples.jyutping: hoi1 wui2
examples.translation: to have a meeting

senses.definition: 創辦；設立；整新嘢 (to start something new)

examples.jyutping: hoi1 gung1 si1
examples.translation: to start a company

senses.definition: 指發動機器／引擎去運作或者駕駛 (to start up; to turn on)

examples.jyutping: hoi1 ce1
examples.translation: to start a vehicle

senses.definition: #發射 (to shoot; to discharge ammunition)

examples.jyutping: ho1 fo2
examples.translation: to open fire

senses.definition: #發出、#提出 (to issue; to dispense)

examples.jyutping: hoi1 zi1 piu3
examples.translation: to write a cheque

senses.definition: 發掘；拓展；外露 (to discover; to explore; to expose)

examples.text: 我個角色升級之後，開咗個新地圖出嚟。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 go3 gok3 sik1 sing1 kap1 zi1 hau6, hoi1 zo2 go3 san1 dei6 tou4 ceot1 lai4.
examples.translation: After my character has leveled up, a new map is revealed.

senses.definition: 揭曉；公佈 (to release a result; to reveal)

examples.jyutping: hoi1 gu2
examples.translation: to reveal the answer

senses.definition: 割、劏做幾份；分割 (to cut into pieces; to divide)

examples.jyutping: ceoi4 dak1 hoi1
examples.translation: to be divisible

senses.definition: 混合調製（液體） (to create a liquid mixture)

examples.jyutping: hoi1 ngaan4 liu2
examples.translation: to mix acrylic paint

senses.definition: 愉快噉使用；通常係指食物 (to enjoy and use; usually in reference to food)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 枱上嘅食物請大家隨便享用。
examples.jyutping: toi2 soeng6 ge3 sik6 mat6 cing2 daai6 gaa1 ceoi4 bin2 hoeng2 jung6
examples.translation: Please enjoy the dishes on the table.

senses.definition: 喺#液體、#固體 裏面，#氣體 所形成嘅空間（量詞：個） (bubble)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 梳打水裏面有好多氣泡。
examples.jyutping: so1 daa2 seoi2 leoi5 min6 jau5 hou2 do1 hei3 paau1.
examples.translation: There are many bubbles in soda water.

senses.definition: 利用液體將啲嘢淋濕嘅動作 (to pour liquid to something)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.translation: to pour oil to fire; to make something worse

senses.definition: 心胸#氣度 (breadth of mind; literally: chest)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: hung1 kam1 gwong2 fut3
examples.translation: broad-minded

senses.definition: #殺 死重要或者出名嘅人 (to assassinate)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: zung2 tung2 bei6 hang4 ci3.
examples.translation: The president was assassinated.

senses.definition: 即係#囂張；形容人睇落好自大，睇唔起其他人 (arrogant; boastful)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 你咁囂，好難有人鐘意同你玩個噃。
examples.jyutping: nei5 gam3 hiu1, hou2 naan4 jau5 jan4 zung1 ji3 tung4 nei5 waan2 go3 bo3.
examples.translation: You are so arrogant. No one will want to play with you because of that.

senses.definition: 用#武器#打交，通常牽涉好多人，喺#街頭 發生 (to engage in an armed fight; usually ones that happen on streets and involves many people)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: tou2 haak3 haai6 dau3
examples.translation: Punti–Hakka Clan Wars

senses.definition: 地區名；位於#中國 最南端嘅海洋省份，簡稱「瓊」；地理上位於#熱帶，分為本島同離島；省會係#海口 (Hainan)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 島名；即係#海南島，係海南省嘅本島；位處#南海 西北部，北隔瓊州海峽同#廣東 省雷州半島相望；別稱瓊州 (Hainan Island)
講嘢之前冇諗清楚後果 (to have a quick tongue; to be fast in talking, usually without much consideration of the consequences)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 你成日貪口爽，亂咁講嘢！
examples.jyutping: nei5 seng4 jat6 taam1 hau2 song2, lyun2 gam3 gong2 je5!
examples.translation: You are always quick in tongue and talk nonsense!

senses.definition: 姓 (a surname, usually transliterated as "Hon")
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: #中國#戰國 時代嘅其中一個國家 (one of the states in the Warring States period of China)
#小朋友 (child)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 佢只係個孩童，唔可以俾佢一個人留喺屋企。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 zi2 hai6 go3 haai4 tung4, m4 ho2 ji5 bei2 keoi5 jat1 go3 jan2 lau4 hai2 uk1 kei2.
examples.translation: He is just a child, he cannot stay at home alone.

senses.definition: 山脈名；位於#西藏 同#印度 中間，將#印度 次大陸同#青藏高原 分隔開 (The Himalayas)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 即係#講笑 (to joke; to make fun of)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 我同你開玩笑啫，使乜咁認真喎！
examples.jyutping: ngo5 tung4 nei5 hoi1 waan4 siu3 ze1, sai2 mat1 gam3 jing6 zan1 wo5!
examples.translation: I'm just kidding. Why do you have to be so serious?

senses.definition: 標示#體系 名稱嘅後綴 (system; series)
senses.label: 語素

examples.jyutping: taai3 joeng4 hai6
examples.translation: solar system

senses.definition: 允許；准許 (permission; approval)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 你要得到政府嘅許可先可以用呢個場地。
examples.jyutping: nei5 jiu3 dak1 dou3 zing3 fu2 ge3 heoi2 ho2 sin1 ho2 ji5 jung6 ni1 go3 coeng4 dei6.
examples.translation: You require the government's permission in order to use this venue.

senses.definition: 紅色暴雨警告信號嘅簡稱；係香港#天文台 發出第二級嘅暴雨警告，表示廣泛地區錄得或者預料雨量超過每小時50毫米，而且雨勢可能持續 (red rainstorm signal, literally "red rain")
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 宜家掛咗紅雨，小學生唔使返學喇！
examples.jyutping: ji4 gaa1 gwaa3 zo2 hung4 jyu5, siu2 hok6 saang1 m4 sai2 faan2 hok6 laa3!
examples.translation: The red rainstorm signal has been hoisted. Primary school students need not go to school!

senses.definition: 因為一啲好荒謬無理嘅舉止而抵畀人笑 (laughable; ridiculous)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 你問呢個咁幼稚嘅問題真係可笑啊！
examples.jyutping: nei5 man6 nei1 go3 gam3 jau3 zi6 ge3 man6 tai4 zan1 hai6 ho2 siu3 aa3!
examples.translation: It's so ridiculous for you to ask such a silly question!

senses.definition: 男性喺傳統性別定型中嘅氣慨；好多時係講男性嘅牀上功夫 (manliness; masculinity (especially on bed))
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 我男朋友尋晚大振雄風，我好耐未試過䟴得咁爽。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 naam4 pang4 jau5 cam4 maan5 daai6 zan3 hung4 fung1, ngo5 hou2 noi6 mei6 si3 gwo3 an3 dak1 gam3 song2.
examples.translation: My boyfriend got all fired up last night, it felt so good that my hips were moving on their own.

senses.definition: 一個隆重嘅慶祝場合、典禮 (celebration)

examples.jyutping: sing4 laap6 hing3 din2
examples.translation: anniversary celebration

senses.definition: 冇嘢做嘅時間 (free time)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: dak1 haan4 lei4 taam3 ngo5.
examples.translation: Come over when you have time.

senses.definition: 一個空間之中冇任何嘢存在嘅狀態 (empty; blank; vacant)

examples.jyutping: lau4 hung1 jat1 hong4 wai2
examples.translation: to leave a row of seats vacant

senses.definition: 寬闊平坦 (broad and flat)

senses.definition: #高級文憑 嘅俗稱 (colloquial address for higher diploma)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 大專院校嘅教學分支單位，喺#學院 之下聯繫相類近#學系 嘅學術範疇（量詞：個） (academic division (of a tertiary institution))
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: jan4 man4 hok6 bou6
examples.translation: division of humanities

senses.definition: 大專院校按照學術範疇而設嘅單位，低級過#學部、#學院（量詞：個） (academic department; faculty)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: jau3 ji4 gaau3 juk6 hok6 hai6
examples.translation: department of early child education

senses.definition: 由兩個代表男性代名詞嘅英文「he」組成，喺講男同性戀嘅時候用，又引申嚟形容兩個好熟絡嘅男性#基友、男#同志 (something between two close male friends; gay, gayish)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: heoi3 hi1 hi1
examples.translation: a male to go somewhere with a close male friend

senses.definition: 討人厭；令人煩厭 (loathed or hated by others; disgusting; terrible; awful; outrageous; literally: to beg people hate)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 佢成日大聲講電話，好乞人憎。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 sing4 jat6 daai6 seng1 gong2 din6 waa2, hou2 hat1 jan4 zang1.
examples.translation: How disgusting of him to always talk loudly on his phone.

senses.definition: 幸好；表示一樣嘢對當時環境有利 (fortunately; luckily)
senses.label: 副詞

examples.text: 好在佢當時唔喺屋企，先至冇事咋。
examples.jyutping: hou2 zoi6 keoi5 dong1 si4 m4 hai2 uk1 kei2, sin1 zi3 mou5 si6 zaa3.
examples.translation: Fortunately he was not at home at that time, so he was safe from danger.

senses.definition: 用喺反問句式入面，指出要求太過份或者欠人哋太多人情所以覺得「#唔好意思」 (have the nerve; have the cheek)
senses.label: 副詞

examples.jyutping: nei5 hou2 ji3 si1 keoi5 zyut6 keoi5 me1?
examples.translation: How could you have the nerve to reject him?

senses.definition: 即係啱啱好，切合條件；喺啲比較嚴肅嘅討論用嘅字眼 (appropriate; proper; suitable; usually used in formal or serious contexts)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 呢件事你處理得好恰當。
examples.jyutping: ni1 gin6 si6 nei5 cyu5 lei5 dak1 hou2 hap1 dong3.
examples.translation: You deal with this issue very appropriately.

senses.definition: #氣體 嘅物質 (gas)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: duk6 hei3
examples.translation: poison gas

senses.definition: 即係#空氣 (air)

examples.jyutping: tau3 hei3
examples.translation: to let air through

senses.definition: 即係#士氣 (spirit; morale)

examples.jyutping: daa2 hei3
examples.translation: to cheer for; to boost the morale

senses.definition: 即係#呼吸 (breath)

examples.jyutping: tyun5 hei3
examples.translation: to breathe one's last

senses.definition: 喺醫院入面，負責照顧病人嘅工作人員，需要有一定嘅醫學知識，可以做簡單嘅醫治同檢查（例如處理傷口、抽血等等）。（量詞：個／名） (nurse; carer)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: #韓 式燒肉嘅簡稱 (bulgogi; Korean barbecue)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 食韓燒冇牛肉似乎唔多夠喉喎。
examples.jyutping: sik6 hon4 siu1 mou5 ngau4 juk6 ci5 fu4 m4 do1 gau3 hau4 wo3.
examples.translation: It seems that we won't get a kick out of Korean barbecue without beef.

senses.definition: 人#死 咗；離開世界 (to pass away; to die; literally: to leave the world)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 佢年幼嘅時候，父母就先後去世。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 nin4 jau3 ge3 si4 hau6, fu6 mou5 zau6 sin1 hau6 heoi3 sai3.
examples.translation: When he was small, his parents passed away successively.

senses.definition: 河嘅底部嘅土地 (river bed; stream bed)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 泛指一啲不祥嘅嘢 (bad; unfortunate; inauspicious; ominous)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.jyutping: hung1 siu6
examples.translation: bad omen

senses.definition: 形容人好惡 (fierce; violent)

examples.jyutping: hung1 ok3
examples.translation: fierce

senses.definition: #電力；電子訊號（電力工程術語） (electricity; electronic signal)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 條電排有氣，小心唔好掂落去！
examples.jyutping: tiu4 din6 paai4 jau5 hei3, siu2 sam1 m4 hou2 dim3 lok6 heoi3!
examples.translation: The electrical line is live. Be careful not to touch it!

senses.definition: 犯下殺人、傷人等凶案嘅人（量詞：名／個） (person who committed a violent crime)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 殺陳生嘅兇徒仍然在逃。
examples.jyutping: saat3 can4 saang1 ge3 hung1 tou4 jing4 jin4 zoi6 tou4
examples.translation: The murderer of Mr. Chan is still at large.

senses.definition: 罕有，因而令人感到詫異 (rare; strange)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 你未見過狗仔跳舞咩？有乜咁稀奇喎。
examples.jyutping: nei5 mei6 gin3 gwo3 gau2 zai2 tiu3 mou5 me1? jau5 mat1 gam3 hei1 kei4 wo3.

senses.definition: 簡單；容易；隨便 (easily; lightly)
senses.label: 副詞

examples.text: 唔可以俾小朋友輕易拎到危險物品。
examples.jyutping: m4 ho2 ji5 bei2 siu2 pang4 jau5 hing1 ji6 ling1 dou2 ngai4 him2 mat6 ban2.
examples.translation: Don't let children reach dangerous items easily.

senses.definition: 天色黑暗，冇月光、星光嘅夜晚 (dark night)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 因為#滿足 而得到嘅#快樂 (happiness; bliss)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 幸福唔需要刻意去追求，幸福自然會嚟揾你。
examples.jyutping: hang6 fuk1 m4 seoi1 jiu3 hak1 ji3 heoi3 zeoi1 kau4, hang6 fuk1 zi6 jin4 wui5 lei4 wan2 nei5
examples.translation: You don't have to search for happiness. Happiness will find you.

senses.definition: #走路 ；#前進 (to walk; to move forward)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 我哋要喺崎嶇嘅山路上面行走
examples.jyutping: ngo5 dei6 jiu3 hai2 kei1 keoi1 ge3 saan1 lou6 soeng6 min6 hang4 zau2
examples.translation: We have to walk on a rugged mountain path.

senses.definition: 完全置身喺一樣嘢度 (to immerse oneself entirely in)

examples.jyutping: hang4 zau2 gong1 wu4 gei2 sap6 nin4
examples.translation: to have lived and worked in the world for many years

senses.definition: 人對於一啲未知事物、或者一啲可能會傷害自己嘅事物，所產生嘅抗拒感同無力感 (fear; terror; dread)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 要戰勝你嘅恐懼，就要去面對佢。
examples.jyutping: jiu3 zin3 sing3 nei5 ge3 hung2 geoi6, zau6 jiu3 heoi3 min6 deoi3 keoi5.
examples.translation: To overcome fear, you must face it.

senses.definition: 姓 (a surname)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 農曆新一年嘅年初二 (the 2nd day of a new Chinese lunar year)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 容易、輕省 (light)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.jyutping: hing1 sung1 ge3 gung1 zok3
examples.translation: light work; soft job; cushy job

senses.definition: 放鬆，即係冇晒壓力 (relaxed)

examples.text: 考完試，成個人都輕鬆晒。
examples.jyutping: haau2 jyun4 si5, sing4 go3 jan4 dou1 hing1 sung1 saai3.
examples.translation: I feel much more relaxed after I've finished the exam.

senses.definition: 形容人嘅情緒失控爆發 (hysteria)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 佢唔識控制情緒，一唔開心就歇斯底里噉大叫。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 m4 sik1 hung3 zai3 cing4 seoi5, jat1 m4 hoi1 sam1 zau6 hit3 si1 dai2 lei5 gam2 daai6 giu3.
examples.translation: He can't control his own emotions and screams hysterically whenever he is unhappy.

senses.definition: 同喺天空以機械飛行有關 (aviation)
senses.label: 區別詞

examples.jyutping: hong4 hung1 mou5 laam6
examples.translation: aircraft carrier

senses.definition: 感覺、特徵（量詞：絲／種） (flavour)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: jau5 koeng4 lit6 ge3 hoeng1 tou2 hei3 sik1
examples.translation: to have a strong flavor of one's hometown

senses.definition: 呼吸； 生命跡象（量詞：絲／種） (breath; breathing)

examples.text: 救護車趕到嚟嗰時，佢已經冇咗氣息嚹。
examples.jyutping: gau3 wu6 ce1 gon2 dou3 lai4 go2 si4, keoi5 ji5 ging1 mou5 zo2 hei3 sik1 laa3.
examples.translation: When the ambulance came, he had already lost his breath.

senses.definition: 大聲噉為你支持嘅人打氣；鼓勵，以示支持 (to acclaim; to cheer; to applaud)

examples.text: 比賽結果宣布咗之後，在場嘅觀眾都好大聲咁喺度喝采。
examples.jyutping: bei2 coi3 git3 gwo2 syun1 bou3 zo2 zi1 hau6, zoi6 coeng4 ge3 gun1 zung3 dou1 hou2 daai6 seng1 gam2 hai2 dou6 hot3 coi2.
examples.translation: After the competition results were announced, the audience cheered loudly.

senses.definition: 冇用途嘅地方，多數形容一啲室內空間，或者土地 ((of places, esp. houses and apartments) unoccupied; vacant)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.jyutping: hung1 zi3 daan1 wai2
examples.translation: vacant flat

senses.definition: 有活力噉；好狂熱噉，包含興奮嘅意思，想將做緊嘅嘢一直持續落去 (energetic; enthusiastic)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.jyutping: go3 go1 sing1 jyut6 coeng3 jyut6 hei2 ging3.
examples.translation: The singer sings more and more energetically.

senses.definition: 一件事嘅後果影響到另外嘅事同人；株連；連累 (to implicate sby; to be adversely involved in trouble)

examples.jyutping: ni1 zung1 on3 gin2 hin1 lin4 hou2 do1 jan4

senses.definition: 嘴下面嘅部分；#下顎（量詞：個） (chin; lower jaw)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: soeng1 haa6 paa4
examples.translation: double chin

senses.definition: 信得過嘅；有保證嘅 (credible; convincing; believable)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 呢個統計數字可唔可信㗎？
examples.jyutping: ni1 go3 tung2 gai3 sou3 zi6 ho2 m4 ho2 seon3 gaa3?
examples.translation: Is this statistic authentic?

senses.definition: 利用謊言隱瞞真相，令人上當 (to deceive; to cheat)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 佢諗佢老公重係愛自己嘅，但係其實佢欺騙緊自己。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 nam2 keoi5 lou5 gung1 zung6 hai6 oi3 zi6 gei2 ge3, daan6 hai6 kei4 sat6 keoi5 hei1 pin3 gan2 zi6 gei2
examples.translation: She thinks her husband still loves her, but in reality she's deceiving herself.

senses.definition: 設定一個指定嘅範圍，唔俾超越 (to set a limit; to restrict)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: wui2 jyun4 haan6 ding6
examples.translation: members only

senses.definition: 某啲嘢少咗或者唔夠 (deficiency; shortcoming)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 雖然佢嘅物質生活好豐富，但係精神生活有好多欠缺。
examples.jyutping: seoi1 jin4 keoi5 ge3 mat6 zat1 sang1 wut6 hou2 fung1 fu3, daan6 hai6 zing1 san4 sang1 wut6 jau5 hou2 do1 him3 kyut3.

senses.definition: 容易相處；待人以寬 (easy-going; easy to get along with; friendly)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 你上司咁好相與，請半日假應該冇問題嘅。
examples.jyutping: nei5 soeng6 si1 gam3 hou2 soeng1 jyu5, ceng2 bun3 jat6 gaa3 jing1 goi1 mou5 man6 tai4 ge3.
examples.translation: Since your boss is easy-going, I think it's not a problem for you to take a half-day leave.

senses.definition: #打喊路 嘅書面語；係覺得攰或者空氣唔流通時，身體會自然咁擘大個口深呼吸，提高體內嘅含氧量 (yawn)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 上堂嗰時，同學仔都打喊路。
examples.jyutping: soeng5 tong4 go2 si4, tung4 hok6 zai2 dou1 daa2 haam3 lou6.
examples.translation: Classmates are yawning during the lesson.

senses.definition: 喺一段運氣好好、做咩都好順利嘅時間 (to be in great luck)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 今次行運喇，抽獎中咗#頭獎 啊！
examples.jyutping: gam1 ci3 haang4 wan6 laa3, cau1 zoeng2 zung3 zo2 tau4 zoeng2 aa3!
examples.translation: This time we are in great luck, we won the first prize in lucky draw!

senses.definition: 善意嘅、希望對方接納嘅建議、提醒（量詞：個） (advice; exhortation)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 呢個係我最後嘅勸告，你聽唔聽由得你。
examples.jyutping: ni1 go3 hai6 ngo5 zeoi3 hau6 ge3 hyun3 gou3, nei5 teng1 m4 teng1 jau2 dak1 nei5.
examples.translation: This is my last exhortation to you. Take my advice or not, it's your call.

senses.definition: #朱古力；用可可豆、牛奶、糖製成嘅食物，係 chocolate 嘅#國語 音譯（量詞：塊） ("chocolate" in Putonghua)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: siu2 pang4 jau5 zung1 ji3 zyu1 gu1 lik1.
examples.translation: Kids likes chocolate.

senses.definition: 用嚟捉動物嘅機關；引申指一啲引人中計嘅狀況（量詞：個） (trap; pitfall)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: kau4 zik1 ham6 zing6
examples.translation: employment traps

senses.definition: 牽動人情緒嘅非具體環境 (atmosphere; ambience)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 小朋友最好喺愉快嘅氣氛下學習。
examples.jyutping: siu2 pang4 jau5 zeoi3 hou2 hai2 jyu6 faai3 ge3 hei3 fan1 haa6 hok6 zaap6.
examples.translation: Children should learn in a happy atmosphere.

senses.definition: 不斷嘅堅持；唔會變嘅決心 (perseverance)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 努力同恆心係成功嘅唯一方法。
examples.jyutping: nou5 lik6 tung4 hang4 sam1 hai6 sing4 gung1 ge3 wai4 jat1 fong1 faat3.
examples.translation: The only way to succeed is through hard work and dogged perseverance.

senses.definition: 一種好多窿嘅材料，吸水好勁，彈力好強，好多時會用嚟做清潔用品（量詞：塊／嚿） (sponge, a cleaning tool)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: maai5 gau6 hoi2 min4 faan1 lai4 sai2 wun2.
examples.translation: To buy a sponge for washing dishes.

senses.definition: 一種海洋動物 (sponge, an aquatic animal)
海洋、陸地、天空嘅統稱 (sea, land and sky)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: hoi2 luk6 hung1 saam1 gwan1
examples.translation: navy, army and air force

senses.definition: 形容一件機率唔大嘅事發生咗 (coincidental)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.jyutping: zong6 dou2 nei5 zan1 hai6 kiu2.
examples.translation: What a coincidence that I bump into you!

senses.definition: 覺得人或者事物慘；同情甚至去幫佢 (to have pity on; to pity)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 好似佢呢啲衰人，唔抵可憐㗎！
examples.jyutping: hou2 ci5 keoi5 ni1 di1 seoi1 jan4, m4 dai2 ho2 lin4 gaa3!
examples.translation: A bad person like him does not deserve to have people take pity on him.

senses.definition: 用於同周年有關嘅祝福或紀念 (celebration of anniversary occasions)
senses.label: 語素

examples.jyutping: ngan4 hei1
examples.translation: sliver jubilee

senses.definition: 盡心盡力咁侍養屋企嘅長輩，回報養育之恩 ((of descendants in a family) filial piety)
senses.label: 語素

examples.jyutping: haau3 seon6
examples.translation: to have filial piety

senses.definition: 俾路人行嘅#天橋，通常係用嚟橫過繁忙嘅馬路、公路、鐵路，或者連接唔同嘅建築物（量詞：條） (footbridge; pedestrian bridge; pedestrian overpass; pedestrian overcrossing; elevated walkway)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 花費金錢 (to cost)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: nei1 go3 gung1 cing4 hou3 fai3 gan6 baak3 maan6.
examples.translation: This infrastructure project nearly costs a million.

senses.definition: #猴；#馬騮 (monkey)

senses.label: 動詞

senses.label: 副詞

senses.definition: 將#煙草 絲用紙包做圓筒型嘅煙草產品；吸法係喺一邊點火，另一邊吸入燃燒產生嘅氣體（量詞：枝） (cigarette; tobacco)

examples.jyutping: faan3 maai6 zau2 si1 hoeng1 jin1
examples.translation: to traffic contraband cigarettes

senses.definition: 一種非正餐嘅飲食活動，介乎午飯同晚飯之間（量詞：餐／個） (afternoon tea; a light meal in the afternoon)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 而家三點三，去食個下午茶先。
examples.jyutping: ji4 gaa1 saam1 dim2 saam1, heoi3 sik6 go3 haa6 ng5 caa4 sin1.
examples.translation: It is three fifteen now, let's go out for an afternoon tea.

senses.definition: 一啲公司或者舖頭正式運作或者營業 ((of companies or shops) to start a business; to open for business)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 呢間公司新開張，所以大減價一個星期吸引顧客。
examples.jyutping: ni1 gaan1 gung1 si1 san1 hoi1 zoeng1, so2 ji5 daai6 gaam2 gaa3 jat1 go3 sing1 kei4 kap1 jan5 gu3 haak3.
examples.translation: As it is the opening of a new shop, a sale has been launched in order to attract customers.

senses.definition: #運氣 好，發生咗一啲對自己有利嘅事，或者得以避免墮入困境 (lucky; fortunate)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 我俾人偷咗銀包，好彩我喺對鞋入邊攝咗啲錢唧。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 bei2 jan4 tau1 zo2 ngan4 baau1, hou2 coi2 ngo5 hai2 deoi3 haai4 jap6 bin1 sip3 zo2 di1 cin2 zek1.
examples.translation: My purse was nicked, but I was lucky that I slipped some cash under my socks.

senses.definition: 一種禾本科芳香植物 (lemon grass)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: hoeng1 maau4 hou2 jau5 keoi1 man1 zok3 jung6.
examples.translation: It is effective to use lemon grass to drive mosquito.

senses.definition: 非常強壯而有力 (physically strong; muscular)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 胖虎佢真係孔武有力，一手打到大雄飛上天。
examples.jyutping: bun6 fu2 keoi5 zan1 hai6 hung2 mou5 jau5 lik6, jat1 sau2 daa2 dou3 daai6 hung4 fei1 soeng5 tin1.
examples.translation: Giant is so strong that he sent Nobita flying with a punch.

senses.definition: 利用空路、水路由一個地方去另一個地方嘅過程 (trip; flight)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 由香港去日本嘅航程需要四個鐘頭。
examples.jyutping: jau4 hoeng1 gong2 heoi3 jat6 bun2 ge3 hong4 cing4 seoi1 jiu3 sei3 go3 zung1 tau4.
examples.translation: The flight from Hong Kong to Japan takes four hours.

senses.definition: 輕碰、觸摸、擦到而受傷 (to be harmed or damaged by light physical contact; to be scratched; to be grazed)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 頭先差啲畀架的士揩親。
examples.jyutping: tau4 sin1 caa1 di1 bei2 gaa3 dik1 si2 haai1 can1.
examples.translation: I was almost grazed by the taxi just now.

senses.definition: 因為做唔到一啲嘢而覺得失望、遺憾 (it is a pity)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 錯過咗你嘅表演，真係可惜。
examples.jyutping: co3 gwo3 zo2 nei5 ge3 biu2 jin2, zan1 hai6 ho2 sik1.
examples.translation: What a pity I missed your performance!

senses.definition: 表示做唔到一啲嘢而感到失望、遺憾 (it is a pity that)
senses.label: 副詞

examples.jyutping: ho2 sik1 ngo5 lai4 ci4 zo2.
examples.translation: It is a pity that I came late.

senses.definition: 有責任或者義務去俾啲嘢人哋 (to owe; to be indebted)

senses.definition: 少咗某啲嘢；某啲嘢唔夠，達唔到某個水平 (to be short of; to be deficient in; to lack; to not meet (a standard))

examples.jyutping: ban2 hang6 him3 gaai1
examples.translation: to have poor conduct

senses.definition: 非常高尚、動人同悲傷，令人要為之歌頌、流淚 (moving and heroic; touching; literally, worth praise worth crying)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 岳飛嘅故事真係可歌可泣。
examples.jyutping: ngok6 fei1 ge3 gu3 si6 zan1 hai6 ho2 go1 ho2 jap1.

senses.definition: 一種葫蘆科佛手瓜屬植物，果實綠色，可以食用 (chayote; choko)

senses.definition: 用嚟數細件嘅物品 (classifier for assorted small objects)

senses.definition: 笑聲嘅形聲詞；有時會表示一樣嘢其實唔係好好笑，只係勉為其難咁笑下嘅意思 (ha-ha)

examples.text: 聽日就係deadline，我哋今晚要開turbo做埋個project。

senses.definition: 過咗啲時候；用嚟表示比之前講嗰個時間遲發生嘅嘢 (afterwards; later)

senses.definition: #海 上面嘅航道 (sea lane)

examples.text: 元旦凌晨，海上嘅船隻都響起汽笛慶祝。

senses.definition: 鍾意甚至沉迷色情同淫慾 (salacious; lecherous; perverted; having or showing excessive or offensive sexual desire; literally "salty and wet")

senses.definition: 形容有色情成份嘅事物 (pornographic; erotic; dirty)

senses.definition: 口乾，想飲水 (thirsty)

senses.definition: 合乎道理；大家都會覺得係正常 (reasonable; rational)

examples.jyutping: gaa3 cin4 ji5 ging1 wui4 lok6 dou3 hap6 lei5 seoi2 ping4.

senses.definition: #學習；得到知識、技能 (to learn; to study)

examples.jyutping: nei5 jiu3 go3 zai2 tung4 si4 hok6 jing1 man2, faat3 man2 tung4 jat6 man2, keoi5 hai6 mai6 zan1 hai6 hok6 dak1 sik1 gaa3?
examples.translation: You make your son study English, French and Japanese at the same time. Can he really learn all of them successfully?

senses.definition: 大規模打交、涉及好多人嘅群毆；通常指黑社會或者社團啲人拎架撐好大班人打交 (to have a big gang fight, a large gang battle.)
senses.label: 動詞

senses.definition: 由人組成嘅群體，可能係因為興趣、意見或者其他嘢有共通之處（量詞：個） ((social) circle; a group of people)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: siu2 hyun1 zi2
examples.translation: a clique

senses.definition: 因為#恐懼 而失咗方寸，唔知做乜嘢好 (panic)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 槍聲一響，立刻引起群眾一陣恐慌。
examples.jyutping: coeng1 seng1 jat1 hoeng2, laap6 hak1 jan5 hei2 kwan4 zung3 jat1 zan6 hung2 fong1
examples.translation: The sound of gunfire panicked the crowd.

senses.definition: 行為惡劣而影衰成個群體嘅人（量詞：個／隻） (literally, "horse harming the whole herd"; evil member that brings disgrace to the group; black sheep)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 就係你依個害群之馬唔肯練歌，搞到我哋贏唔到歌唱比賽喇！
examples.jyutping: zau6 hai6 nei5 ji1 go3 hoi6 kwan4 zi1 maa5 m4 hang2 lin6 go1, gaau2 dou3 ngo5 dei6 jeng4 m4 dou2 go1 coeng3 bei2 coi3 laa3!
examples.translation: You are such a black sheep! It is you who refused practicing that makes us failed to win the singing contest.

senses.definition: 對人有害嘅昆蟲；可以係傳播疾病或者係危害農作物等（量詞：隻/群） (harmful insect; pest; vermin)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 農夫為咗消滅害蟲，會用到農藥同殺蟲劑。
examples.jyutping: nung4 fu1 wai6 zo2 siu1 mit6 hoi6 cung4, wui5 jung6 dou3 nung4 joek6 tung4 saat3 cung4 zai1.
examples.translation: The farmer will spray pesticides and insecticides on the field in order to eradicate pests.

senses.definition: 面對群眾或者鏡頭果陣不知所措 (to have stage fright)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 佢因為怯場，所以唔記得啲對白。
examples.translation: She forgot the dialogue because of her stage fright.

senses.definition: 利用權力威逼弱小社群 (to bully and oppress)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 大商團欺壓小商户嘅情況越嚟越嚴重。
examples.jyutping: daai6 soeng1 tyun4 hei1 aat3 siu2 soeng1 wu6 ge3 cing4 fong3 jyut6 lai4 jyut6 jim4 zung6.
examples.translation: The situation where large companies are bullying and oppressing small shops is getting more serious.

senses.definition: 會跟大隊，同大部分人做相同嘅嘢，遵循規範 (gregarious; sociable)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 佢鍾意獨來獨往，好唔合群，所以冇乜朋友。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 zung1 ji3 duk6 loi4 duk6 wong5, hou2 m4 hap6 kwan4, so2 ji5 mou5 mat1 pang4 jau5.
examples.translation: He is a loner and is not sociable, and that is why he does not have a lot of friends.

senses.definition: 嗰刻講緊嘅段落（群）嘅後面 (passage or paragraph below; the following)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 下文將會闡述大澳漁業嘅發展。
examples.jyutping: haa6 man4 zoeng1 wui5 zin2 seot6 daai6 ou3 jyu4 jip6 ge3 faat3 zin2.
examples.translation: The following paragraphs will discuss the development of Tai O's fishing industry.

senses.definition: 後續嘅發展；結果 (subsequent development; outcome)

examples.text: 我寄咗好多封求職信，但係都冇晒下文。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 gei3 zo2 hou2 do1 fung1 kau4 zik1 seon3, daan6 hai6 dou1 mou5 saai3 haa6 man4.
examples.translation: I sent many job application letter, but there isn't any reply.

phonetic.original: hok6 laap6 gai1 kwan4:hok6 lap6 gai1 kwan4

senses.definition: 才華出眾；喺一班人裏面最突出嗰個 (to be a distinguished or outstanding man in a common crowd; to stand head and shoulders above others; literally: a crane standing among a group of chickens)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 佢自細就好聰明，鶴立雞群，搞到佢而家好自大。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 zi6 sai3 zau6 hou2 cung1 ming4, hok6 laap6 gai1 kwan4, gaau2 dou3 keoi5 ji4 gaa1 hou2 zi6 daai6.
examples.translation: He was so smart that he stood out of the crowd when he was small. This turned him into an arrogant person.

keywords: hok6 laap6 gai1 kwan4:hok6 lap6 gai1 kwan4

senses.definition: 建築、船艙、機艙、客車入面，最低嗰層，或者低啲嗰幾層 (lower level(s); lower deck)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 下級；低層；同一個機構、群體入面職位、地位比較低嘅人 (people at the bottom (of an institution, of a group))
經過商量之後作最後嘅確定、決定 (to determine, to settle)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.translation: The dates for exam are determined.

senses.definition: 有兩邊對稱殼軟體動物嘅統稱，兩個殼中間有條肌肉連住，廣泛生活喺鹹淡水；廣義嚟講包括#青口、#扇貝、#蠔、#蚌；日常講嘅蜆係指喺海邊生活細隻食得嘅品種 ((small) clam)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 工人喺沙灘水退嘅時候挖蜆。
examples.jyutping: gung1 jan4 hai2 saa1 taan1 seoi2 teoi3 ge3 si4 hau6 waat3 hin2.
examples.translation: Workers dug for clams when they ebbed on the beach.

senses.definition: 中醫穴位，打中咗會透唔到氣 (an acupuncture point where you can't breath when it is hit, literally gas door)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 佢啱啱畀個波省中氣門，唞咗一陣先可以出嚟比賽。
examples.translation: He got hit by the ball just above the stomach. He had to take some rest before returning to the match.

senses.definition: 彈頭尖端中空嘅子彈 (Hollow Point Bullet)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 對#虛榮 嘅渴求 (a yearning for vanity)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 呢個和尚仲有虛榮心，修行未到家。
examples.jyutping: nei1 go3 wo4 soeng2 zung6 jau5 heoi1 wing4 sam1, sau1 hang6 mei6 dou3 gaa1.
examples.translation: This monk still has a yearning for vanity, without making any progress in his spiritual exercises.

senses.definition: 可以將空氣輸入一個地方嘅裝置；充氣嘅工具 (air pump)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 一種冇車頂，或可以隨意開閂車頂嘅車輛（量詞：部） (convertible; open car; open-top vehicle; open wagon)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: ngo5 dou1 soeng2 jiu3 gaa3 hoi1 pung4 ce1 / ngo5 dou1 soeng2 jiu3 gaa3 hoi1 fung4 ce1
examples.translation: I want an open car too.

senses.definition: 物品或者服務喺市場上嘅一般價格 (information about the market situation such as quotations on the market or current prices, etc.)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: gaai1 si5 hong4 cing4
examples.translation: the current prices of the wet market goods

senses.definition: 本來只係扮做情侶，結果真係發展出感情 (to have feelings for real when pretending to be lovers)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 佢哋拍完戲對對方了解多咗，先開始拍拖啫，唔算戲假情真。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 dei6 paak3 jyun4 hei3 deoi3 deoi3 fong1 liu5 gaai2 do1 zo2, sin1 hoi1 ci2 paak3 to1 ze1, m4 syun3 hei3 gaa2 cing4 zan1.
examples.translation: They hadn't seen each other until they knew more about each other after shooting the film/drama. So it doesn't mean that they had feelings in the scenes already.

senses.definition: 城市名；位於#古巴 北部，係古巴嘅#首都；粵語傳統譯法為 #夏灣拿 (Havana, Cuba)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 城市名；位於#古巴 北部，係古巴嘅#首都；普通話通常譯做 #哈瓦那 (Havana, Cuba)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 連鎖快餐店 (KFC)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 臨時身份證明書（擔保書）嘅俗稱，係香港嘅一種身份證明文件，出畀換緊或者補領身份證、喺香港申請居留權又或者基於人道理由申請逾期留港嘅人，等佢哋可以暫時逗留香港（量詞：張） (Recognizance, Form No. 8; literally, walk-street paper)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 得閒；空出嚟嘅時間 (leisure; free time)
senses.label: 語素

examples.jyutping: haan4 haa4
examples.translation: one's leisure time

senses.definition: 應付生活要俾嘅錢 (expenses)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: sei3 jan4 gaa1 ting4 ge3 hoi1 siu1 hou2 daai6.
examples.translation: A family of four has high living expenses.

senses.definition: 冇良心，希望其他人受傷害，或者置其他人生死於不顧 (black hearted; cruel; evil)

examples.jyutping: nei5 gam3 haak1 sam1 soeng2 jan4 sei2 gaa3!
examples.translation: How can you be so evil and wish the death of somebody!

senses.definition: 一種男女混合運動，玩法係將個波掟入對方嗰邊嘅籃筐入面嚟攞分 (korfball)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 同#玩 或者#笑 有關 (to play; to laugh)
senses.label: 語素

phonetic.original: haang4 syun4 paau2 maa5 saam1 fan1 him2
jyutping: haang4 syun4 paau2 maa5 saam1 fan1 him2

senses.definition: 出門搭交通工具會有風險，要特別小心 (to take care of the risks when going out and taking transport)

keywords: haang4 syun4 paau2 maa5 saam1 fan1 him2
haang syun paau maa saam fan him

senses.definition: 降低自己身份，向其他人提出請求 (to beg for; to implore)

examples.text: 我有罪，我乞求上帝嘅寬恕。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 jau5 zeoi6, ngo5 hat1 kau4 soeng6 dai3 ge3 fun1 syu3.

senses.definition: 甜味嘅調味品，食用糖類，係#紅糖 嘅一種，但顏色比較深，接近黑色，有粉狀同塊狀 (muscovado sugar; dark brown sugar)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.label: 動詞

examples.translation: They met by chance at the airport.

senses.definition: 比賽或者選舉裏面，等緊俾人選出嚟獲得某個資格 (to stand for an election)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: hau6 syun2 jan4
examples.translation: candidate

senses.definition: 城市名；位於#中國 南部，係#海南 嘅省會，亦係海南島東北部嘅沿海城市 (Haikou)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 並非跨過水道嘅橋（量詞：條） (overbridge)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: #花 嘅一種，形狀好似#喇叭 噉（量詞：朵） ((of flower) morning glory)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 即係#骨氣； 堅持正義，唔會輕易屈服嘅美德 (integrity; moral courage)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 唔好因為窮就改變氣節。
examples.translation: Don't lose your integrity simply because your are poor.

senses.definition: 利用#水 將啲嘢淋濕嘅動作 (to pour water to something)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: bong1 di1 faa1 lam4 seoi2
examples.translation: to water the plants

senses.definition: 由於冇光線，所以睇落係黑色 (dark; dim)

examples.text: 我喺黑漆漆嘅街道自己一個行。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 hai2 haak1 cat1 cat1 ge3 gaai1 dou6 zi6 gei1 jat1 go3 haang4.
examples.translation: I walk alone along the road of darkness.

senses.definition: #廚房 (kitchen)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: #好彩 (luckily)
senses.label: 副詞

senses.definition: 將兩邊拍埋、貼埋一齊，見唔到裏面嘅嘢 (to close)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: hap6 maai4 soeng1 ngaan5
examples.translation: to close one's eyes

senses.definition: 地區名；位於#中國 華北嘅省份，#渤海 以西、#山西 以東、#河南 及#山東 以北、#內蒙古 及#遼寧 以南，簡稱「冀」；省會係#石家莊；另外喺地理上包圍#北京 同#天津 兩個#直轄市 (Hebei, Hopeh)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 地方名；#廣州 市區#珠江 北岸嘅俗稱，同#河南 相對 (northern Canton; literally: south of the (Pearl) River)
#香港 三個主要構成部份之一（其餘兩個係#九龍 同#新界）；位於香港南部，係香港境內第二大島，亦係香港最早發展嘅區域 (Hong Kong Island)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 佢一直覺得住喺香港島嘅人高級啲。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 jat1 zik6 gok3 dak1 zyu6 hai2 hoeng1 gong2 dou2 ge3 jan4 gou1 kap1 di1.
examples.translation: He always thinks that people who live on Hong Kong Island are superior.

senses.definition: 關係到；同某一件事有關連 (to involve; to concern)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 呢次改革牽涉好多部門。
examples.jyutping: li1 ci3 goi2 gaak3 hin1 sip3 hou2 do1 bou6 mun4
examples.translation: This reform will involve many departments.

senses.definition: 口沒遮攔，成日講埋啲衰嘢 (to always commit a gaffe and say some bad things)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 佢雖然口賤，但都有好多朋友。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 seoi1 jin4 hau2 zin6, daan6 dou1 jau5 hou2 do1 pang4 jau5.
examples.translation: Although he always commits a gaffe and says some bad things, he has many friends.

senses.definition: 口水四圍噴 (spittle flying from lips)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 佢太緊張咬字，口沫橫飛都冇察覺。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 taai3 gan2 zoeng1 ngaau5 zi6, hau2 mut6 waang4 fei1 dou1 mou5 caat3 gok3.
examples.translation: Caring too much about his pronunciation, he did not notice that his spittle was flying from his lips.

senses.definition: 比喻高談闊論，暢快噉談論 (figuratively, to talk freely and fluently)

examples.text: 講到自己嘅專業領域，佢就口沫橫飛，滔滔不絕。
examples.jyutping: gong2 dou3 zi6 gei2 ge3 zyun1 jip6 ling5 wik6, keoi5 zau6 hau2 mut6 waang4 fei1, tou1 tou1 bat1 zyut6.
examples.translation: When talking about his own expertise, he keeps speaking freely.

senses.definition: 已經確認咗會擔任某個職位，但係未正式上任 (designate)
senses.label: 區別詞

examples.jyutping: hau6 jam6 zung2 tung2
examples.translation: President-elect

senses.definition: 輕便嘅裝扮、裝備 (light pack/equipment)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: hing1 zong1 soeng5 zan6
examples.translation: to go into battle with a light pack; figuratively, to move forward with one's burdens discarded

senses.definition: 用心噉照顧、愛護 (to love, care and protect (usually female, children, body parts, or precious belongings))
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: ho1 wu6 zi2 neoi5
examples.translation: to care and protect one's children

senses.definition: 有效嘅程度 (effect; effectiveness; efficacy)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 呢兩份合同具有同等法律效力。
examples.jyutping: ni1 loeng5 fan6 hap6 tung4 geoi6 jau5 tung4 dang2 faat3 leot6 haau6 lik6.
examples.translation: These two contracts have the same legal effect.

senses.definition: 形容身形纖瘦或者動作輕快 (slim and graceful; lithe (of a slender figure or movements))
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.jyutping: tai2 taai3 hing1 jing4
examples.translation: graceful carriage, lissome bearing

senses.definition: #航行 路線；飛機或者船嘅移動路線（量詞：條） (air route; ship route)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: hoi1 pik1 san1 hong4 sin3
examples.translation: to open a new air/sea route

senses.definition: 主要流行於#珠江三角洲 一帶嘅一種#水上人 歌謠（量詞：首／隻） (folk song by boat people, mainly around the Pearl River Delta; "salt water song")
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 較年長嘅同校男同學 (male senior schoolmates)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 擔心、放唔低一樣嘢嘅情緒 (emotion of worrying about and unable to let go of something)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 而家我啲仔女大晒，我都冇乜牽掛嘍。
examples.jyutping: ji4 gaa1 ngo5 di1 zai2 neoi2 daai6 saai3, ngo5 dou1 mou5 mat1 hin1 gwaa3 lo3.
examples.translation: Now my children have grown up, I am free of worries.

senses.definition: 將所有嘢加埋一齊 (to add up to; to amount to)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 呢幾個數合計起嚟係一百。
examples.jyutping: ni1 gei2 go3 sou3 hap6 gai3 hei2 lai4 hai6 jat1 baak3.
examples.translation: These numbers add up to 100.

senses.definition: 組織入面冇乜影響力嘅小人物 (unimportant and uninfluential person in an organisation; literally, shrimp and crab soldiers)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 輪迴之後、下一次嘅生命 (the next life; life after reincarnation)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 如果下世我可以再同你喺埋一齊就好喇。
examples.jyutping: jyu4 gwo2 haa6 sai3 ngo5 ho2 ji5 zoi3 tung4 nei5 hai2 maai4 jat1 cai4 zau6 hou2 laa3.
examples.translation: I wish I could be with you again in my next life.

senses.definition: 用嚟講好渺茫、冇乜可能發生嘅事 (used to describe something that is very unlikely to happen)

examples.text: 唔好發白日夢喇！想做有錢佬？下世啦！快啲做嘢啦！
examples.jyutping: m4 hou2 faat3 baak6 jat6 mung6 laa3! soeng2 zou6 jau5 cin2 lou2? haa6 sai3 laa1! faai3 di1 zou6 je5 laa1!
examples.translation: Stop day-dreaming! You want to get rich? Wait for the next life!  Get back to work now!

senses.definition: 本來係#象棋 用語，字面解犧牲隻#車 去保護隻#帥；比喻作犧牲次等重要嘅嘢，去保護最關鍵嘅嘢 (to sacrifice something important in order to safeguard something indispensable; to sacrifice the knights in order to save the queen (in chess); to give up a rook to save the king (in chess); literally: to sacrifice the chariot in order to save the general (in Chinese Chess))
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 公司而家玩派系鬥爭，我老細唯有棄車保帥，踢走自己隻頭馬，保住自己個位。
examples.jyutping: gung1 si1 ji4 gaa1 waan2 paai3 hai6 dau3 zang1, ngo5 lou5 sai3 wai4 jau5 hei3 geoi1 bou2 seoi3, tek3 zau2 zi6 gei2 zek3 tau4 maa5, bou2 zyu6 zi6 gei2 go3 wai2.
examples.translation: The whole company is now knee deep in factional conflicts, my boss was forced to give up a rook to save the king, booting his right hand man in order to save his own skin.

senses.definition: 願意接受其他意見，唔會淨係要其他人跟住自己嗰套 (enlightened; liberal)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 而家社會越嚟越開明，我哋可以揀唔結婚或者唔生細路㗎喇。
examples.jyutping: ji4 gaa1 se5 wui2 jyut6 lai4 jyut6 hoi1 ming4, ngo5 dei6 ho2 ji5 gaan2 m4 git3 fan1 waak6 ze2 m4 saang1 sai3 lou6 gaa3 laa1.
examples.translation: Nowadays the society is more and more liberal: we can choose not to marry or choose not to have children.

senses.definition: #海 入面棲息嘅#魚；同#淡水魚 相對（量詞：條） (sea fish; saltwater fish)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 某啲有重量嘅嘢失去支撐，向下跌 (to fall)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: zik6 sing1 gei1 hai2 hung1 zung1 haa6 zeoi6.
examples.translation: The helicopter falls from the sky.

senses.definition: 水份較多嘅飯 (porridge; rice gruel; congee)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 遇到某件事之後，冇經過思考，即刻諗到嘅事、或作出嘅反應 (subconsciousness; (almost) by reflex)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: ngo5 haa6 ji3 sik1 tiu3 hei2 zim1 giu3
examples.translation: I jump and scream almost by reflex.

senses.definition: 實際上即係「租約#頂手 費」。二戰後香港人口膨脹，租金大幅上升令市民一屋難求，由於有#租務管制 限制業主加租，為討回市價差額，業主用各種名目向租客收取金錢，其中一種就係鞋金，意即業主走上走落幫你打點間屋，行到鞋都蝕嘅補償。 (Shoe money. A kind of "lease transference fee". After the second world war, the rent went up dramatically following the population growth, but as there was Tenancy Control to limit the increasing rate of rent, the flat owner used some other methods to charge tenant for the difference from market price, like the "shoe money", means the compensation of the wearing of flat owner's shoes to walk preparing the flat for tenant.)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 貴重而且豐富嘅大禮（量詞：份） (generous gift)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 送一份厚禮俾你，多謝你做我哋嘅媒人。
examples.jyutping: sung3 jan1 fan6 hau5 lai5 bei2 nei5, do1 ze6 nei5 zou6 ngo5 dei6 ge3 mui4 jan2.
examples.translation: I'd like to give you a generous gift to thank you for being our matchmaker.

senses.definition: #經過 (to pass through; to pass by)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: li1 gaa3 ce1 wui5 haang4 ging1 tyun4 mun4.
examples.translation: This vehicle will go through Tuen Mun.

senses.definition: 今年之前嗰一年 (last year)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 舊年係我人生過得最開心嘅一年。
examples.jyutping: gau6 nin2 hai6 ngo5 jan4 sang1 gwo3 dak1 zeoi3 hoi1 sam1 ge3 jat1 nin4.
examples.translation: Last year was the happiest year in my life.

senses.definition: 幫老人家慶祝生日 (to celebrate the birthday of an elderly person)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 個個子孫都返鄉下同阿爺賀壽。
examples.jyutping: go3 go3 zi2 syun1 dou1 faan1 hoeng1 haa2 tung4 aa3 je4 ho6 sau6.
examples.translation: All descendants return to the village to celebrate grandpa's birthday.

senses.definition: 禽鳥嘅下半身，主要形容#燒味 或者煮熟咗嘅#家禽 (lower half of cooked poultry)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: zek3 siu1 ngo2 bei2 haa6 zong1 ngo5 dak1 laa3.
examples.translation: I only want the lower half of that barbecued goose.

senses.definition: 大學術語，指校內學生組織嘅下一屆幹事，亦指某個人任職嘅校內學生組織嘅下一屆幹事；再下一屆，就喺前面加多個「#下」，如此類推（量詞：個） (committee member of the subsequent session of a university-based student organization, a university jargon; for example, if John is a committee member of the 10th session of an organization and Jane is a committee member of the 11th, then Jane is John's 下莊)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 就嚟開學喇，係時候要籌備招下莊嘅活動喇。
examples.jyutping: zau6 lai4 hoi1 hok6 laa3, hai6 si4 hau6 jiu3 cau4 bei6 ziu1 haa6 zong1 ge3 wut6 dung6 laa3.
examples.translation: The new term is about to begin. It's time to recruit our successors of the society.

senses.definition: #海洋 入面嘅#水 (seawater)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: jung6 hoi2 seoi2 cung1 ci3
examples.translation: to flush the toilet with seawater

senses.label: 動詞

senses.definition: 直接將#屍體 或者#火化 咗嘅#骨灰 放入大海嘅殮葬方式 (burial at sea or scattering of cremated ashes in the sea)

senses.definition: #客户#服務 (customer service)

senses.definition: 教育或者學校內部嘅#制度 (educational or school system)

senses.definition: 用嚟引入正題嘅一啲內容（量詞：句/段） (opening remarks; prologue of a play)

senses.definition: 同某啲嘢一樣；喺某個規定範圍之內；達到某項條件 (to conform to/with; to accord with)

senses.definition: 一啲無無謂謂嘅話題，內容冇特定範圍 (chat)

examples.jyutping: king1 haan4 gai2 ze1, gam2 jing6 zan1 zou6 me1?
examples.translation: We are just chatting.Why so serious?

senses.definition: 設定時間#限制 (to set a time limit of (certain seconds or minutes, etc.))

examples.jyutping: haan6 si4 min5 fai3
examples.translation: free in a limited time period

senses.definition: 要求某啲人遵守限制，通常有時間限制 (to order somebody to follow some regulations)

examples.text: 佢哋限令居民三日內要離開。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 dei2 haan6 ling6 geoi1 man4 saam1 jat6 noi6 jiu3 lei4 hoi1.
examples.translation: They ask residents to leave within 3 days.

senses.definition: 好隨便噉傾下計，內容通常圍繞啲生活上發生嘅瑣碎事 (to chat; to talk casually about something)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 我哋有家庭聚會嗰陣，就會閒話家常。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 dei6 jau5 gaa1 ting4 zeoi6 wui6 go2 zan2, zau6 wui5 haan4 waa6 gaa1 soeng4.
examples.translation: When we have family gathering, we will talk casually about our life.

senses.definition: 虛假同真實，多數指對方嘅實力、內部情況 (truth and falseness, which is usually regraded as the opponent's real strength or internal situation)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 你今晚去偵察下敵方嘅虛實。
examples.jyutping: nei5 gam1 maan5 heoi3 zing1 caat3 haa5 dik6 fong1 ge3 heoi1 sat6.

senses.definition: 由空中安全咁降落地面 ((of flight) to land)

senses.definition: 以區外人嘅身份參選，或者新加入某個機構出任管理層 (to run election as an outsider; to be an externally hired management personnel (as opposed to internal promotion))

examples.jyutping: hung1 gong3 gyun2 lei5 cang4
examples.translation: a manager recruited from outside the company

senses.definition: #睇透 嘅書面語 (to see through)

examples.text: 識咗十年，我一早就睇透咗佢。
examples.translation: I know him for ten years, I can see right through him.

senses.definition: 表面奉迎，暗地裏謀害人地 (two-faced; on the surface fawning and docile, inwardly scheming with malicious intent against others)

examples.text: 佢份人口蜜腹劍，唔好睇佢不停讚你，其實佢隊你兩刀。
examples.translation: Careful on that two-faced guy, he may be praising you by now, but he may betray you anytime.

senses.definition: 未有內容 NO DATA
憤怒而無從發泄 (to be angry and frustrated; to "bottle up" one's rage; literally: breath blocked)

examples.jyutping: lou5 sai3 jau6 mo2 ngo5, zan1 hai6 hei3 ding2!
examples.translation: My boss is harassing me again, I am so angry!

examples.jyutping: keoi5 dou1 hai6 haau6 cou2? m4 hou2 waan2 laa1.

senses.definition: 一種加入#蝦籽 整嘅廣東麪 (shrimp roe noodles)

senses.definition: 點心；用豬肉碎、韭菜、蝦米、冬菇、沙葛做餡，澄麪、糯米粉、糖、豬油、水做皮，炸到變成金黃色。咬落去嘅時候，個皮會外脆內軟。 (fried sticky rice dumplings with meat and shrimp stuffing)

senses.definition: 飛行交通工具（例如飛機、直升機、熱氣球）喺空中發生嘅嚴重意外；多數都會有人喺事件裏面死亡（量詞：場、次） (a disaster caused by an aviation crash; a crash of an airplane, a helicopter, or a balloon; usually refers to the fatal ones)

examples.jyutping: hung1 naan6 jin6 coeng4

senses.definition: #海底 嘅地殼表面 (seabed; sea floor)

senses.definition: #泄氣；失去#鬥志 (to be discouraged)

senses.definition: #起身 (to get out of bed; to get up)

senses.definition: 即係#行李；出門嘅時候所帶嘅袋、箱；裏面裝著你嘅個人物品（量詞:件） (luggage)

責備 (to condemn)

senses.definition: #可可豆 磨碎同脱脂得出嘅粉，可以整#谷古、#朱古力 等 (cocoa powder)

examples.translation: I will get a table first, (you) don't hurry.

examples.jyutping: nei5 jau6 hoi1 hau2 zung3, gu2 si5 zan1 hai6 sing1 wo3.

examples.jyutping: uk1 kei2 go3 haak1 ci3 tung1 fung1 caa1, m4 wai6 sang1.

senses.definition: 作為#校服 嘅#褲 (school pants)

senses.definition: #衞衣（量詞：件） (hoodie)

senses.definition: #後生 嘅女性（量詞：個） (young lady; young woman)

senses.definition: 一句同人講做咗好事之後，冥冥之中會有好事降臨嘅説話 (a kind heart will be rewarded; a saying that good things will occur to you if you have done virtuous deeds)

senses.definition: 表演傳統中式戲劇劇種嘅團體（量詞：個） (traditional theatrical troupe of any variety of Chinese Opera)

senses.definition: #喉嚨 因為感染、敏感、或者講嘢講得太多發炎，導致有痛嘅感覺。吞#口水 嘅時候，會痛得特別犀利。 (sore throat)

examples.text: 喉嚨痛就唔好食咁多#熱氣 嘢啦。
examples.jyutping: hau4 lung4 tung3 zau6 m4 hou2 sik6 gam3 do1 jit6 hei3 je5 laa1.

senses.definition: 用於一個尷尬嘅情況去到極端，已經無話可説嘅時候 (used when the situation goes to the extreme and you cannot find any sentence which is suitable to describe your embarrassment; literally: to burst into tears)

examples.text: 喊出嚟，原來佢唔係小明老婆呀？

senses.definition: 令人增加食欲嘅食物 (dishes that whet the appetite; appetizer)

senses.definition: 形容一個人態度誠懇、真誠 (sincere; earnest in attitude)

senses.definition: 同#點解 (why)
senses.label: 代詞

senses.definition: 同#點樣 (how)
合乎 #情理；順應常理而照顧情感 (to be reasonable (and sensible))

examples.text: 話晒都係屋企人，佢會幫手都係合情合理嘅。

senses.definition: 一般指小型貨車，載貨位置同駕駛座相通（量詞：架／輛／部） (van; dual purpose vehicle; a mid-sized vehicle that has a compartment primarily to hold and carry goods at the back)
